option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %> Distância entre dois pontos <% // obter valores preferindo atributos (do servlet) e depois parâmetros String ax = request.getAttribute("coordenadaAx") != null ? String.valueOf(request.getAttribute("coordenadaAx")) : request.getParameter("coordenadaAx"); String ay = request.getAttribute("coordenadaAy") != null ? String.valueOf(request.getAttribute("coordenadaAy")) : request.getParameter("coordenadaAy"); String bx = request.getAttribute("coordenadaBx") != null ? String.valueOf(request.getAttribute("coordenadaBx")) : request.getParameter("coordenadaBx"); String by = request.getAttribute("coordenadaBy") != null ? String.valueOf(request.getAttribute("coordenadaBy")) : request.getParameter("coordenadaBy"); %>
Calcular distância entre dois pontos
Voltar
<% Object error = request.getAttribute("error"); Object distancia = request.getAttribute("distancia"); if (error != null) { %>
<%= error %>
<% } else if (distancia != null) { %>
Distância: <%= distancia %>
<% } %>

Voltar
